actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to provide emergency farm credit assistance, and for other purposes.
short_title: Emergency Farm Credit Assistance Act of 1985

summary.text: Emergency Farm Credit Assistance Act of 1985 - Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to include "circumstances beyond the borrower's control" (such as income reduction due to death, unemployment, or disaster, or unplanned farm and home operating expenses) as a basis for loan or mortgage foreclosure deferral. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to release to borrowers from normal income security (as defined by this Act) amounts sufficient to assure living and farm operating expenses.

titles.title: Emergency Farm Credit Assistance Act of 1985
A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to provide emergency farm credit assistance, and for other purposes.
